message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm asking $200 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $160. Can we meet in the middle at $170?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. $160 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $180.  It's a fantastic product and you won't regret it!
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $180, but I'm still thinking $160 is a fair price. Can we meet in the middle at $175?
